DataElement.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Bullous Dermatitis at Evaluation Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether bullous dermatitis was/is present during the assessment of a patient with acute Graft vs Host Disease (GVHD).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Bullous Dermatitis at Evaluation Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the acute graft versus host disease, a syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract with onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation, involving the skin, the organ and the enveloping membrane of the body; includes, in addition to the epidermis and dermis, all of the derivatives of the epidermis, e.g., hairs, nails, sudoriferous and sebaceous glands, and mammary glands._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._Inflammation of the skin characterized by the presence of bullae which are filled with fluid.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing within the first 100 days post-transplant, but with short duration.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:Inflammation of the skin characterized by the presence of bullae which are filled with fluid.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
Inflammation of the skin characterized by the presence of bullae which are filled with fluid.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
